section.heading: Nature of remedies.
section.text: The remedies set forth in this subchapter shall be cumulative and not exclusive.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) Mortgage Relief During a Public Health Emergency, see § 401 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).
For temporary (90 days) creation of Tenant payment plans, see § 402 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (90 days) provision dealing with residential cleaning during a public health emergency, see § 403 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (90 days) provision dealing with rent increase prohibition during a public health emergency, see § 406 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (90 days) provision dealing with rent increase prohibition during a public health emergency, see § 2(c) of Coronavirus Support Clarification Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-332, July 7, 2020, 67 DCR 8609).
